<li id="cite_note-43"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-43">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFWong2010" class="citation web cs1">Wong, Kristina (4 January 2010). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/full-body-swimsuit-now-banned-professional-swimmers/story?id=9437780">"Full Body Swimsuit Now Banned for Professional Swimmers"</a>. <i>ABC News</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150607200059/http://abcnews.go.com/Politics/full-body-swimsuit-now-banned-professional-swimmers/story?id=9437780">Archived</a> from the original on 7 June 2015<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">8 June</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=ABC+News&amp;rft.atitle=Full+Body+Swimsuit+Now+Banned+for+Professional+Swimmers&amp;rft.date=2010-01-04&amp;rft.aulast=Wong&amp;rft.aufirst=Kristina&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fabcnews.go.com%2FPolitics%2Ffull-body-swimsuit-now-banned-professional-swimmers%2Fstory%3Fid%3D9437780&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASport" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-44"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-44">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFFIFA2012" class="citation journal cs1">FIFA (2012). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20121030143223/http://www.fifa.com/mm/document/fifaqualityprogramme/goal-linetechnology/01/66/02/89/glt%5Ftesting%5Fmanual%5F2012.pdf">"Testing Manual"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>FIFA Quality Programme for Goal Line Technology</i>. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.fifa.com/mm/document/fifaqualityprogramme/goal-linetechnology/01/66/02/89/glt_testing_manual_2012.pdf">the original</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> on 30 October 2012.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=FIFA+Quality+Programme+for+Goal+Line+Technology&amp;rft.atitle=Testing+Manual&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft.au=FIFA&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fifa.com%2Fmm%2Fdocument%2Ffifaqualityprogramme%2Fgoal-linetechnology%2F01%2F66%2F02%2F89%2Fglt_testing_manual_2012.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASport" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-tind1-58"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-tind1_58-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFNewman2007" class="citation news cs1">Newman, Paul (23 June 2007). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.today/20110818091248/http://www.independent.co.uk/sport/tennis/hawkeye-makes-history-thanks-to-rare-british-success-story-at-wimbledon-454677.html">"Hawk-Eye makes history thanks to rare British success story at Wimbledon"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Independent" title="The Independent">The Independent</a></i>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-59"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-59">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite class="citation news cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/tennis/7305404.stm">"Hawk-Eye challenge rules unified"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. 19 March 2008. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080323085536/http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/tennis/7305404.stm">Archived</a> from the original on 23 March 2008<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">22 August</span> 2008</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=BBC+News&amp;rft.atitle=Hawk-Eye+challenge+rules+unified&amp;rft.date=2008-03-19&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.bbc.co.uk%2Fsport1%2Fhi%2Ftennis%2F7305404.stm&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASport" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-60"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-60">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Fraser-Thomas, J.L., Cote, J., Deakin, J. (2005). "Youth sport programs: an avenue to foster positive youth development". <i>Physical Education and Sport Pedagogy</i>, Vol. 10, No. 1, pp. 1940.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-:0-61"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-:0_61-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-:0_61-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFUNESCO2019" class="citation book cs1">UNESCO (2019). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://unesdoc.unesco.org/ark:/48223/pf0000366771"><i>Strengthening the rule of law through education: a guide for policymakers</i></a>. <li id="cite_note-62"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-62">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFPriestArmstrongDoyleWaters2008" class="citation journal cs1">Priest, N; Armstrong, R; Doyle, J; Waters, E (16 July 2008). <li id="cite_note-63"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-63">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFNRJE2008" class="citation journal cs1">N, Priest; <li id="cite_note-68"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-68">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFMerrett2005" class="citation journal cs1">Merrett, Christopher (2005). <li id="cite_note-69"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-69">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFFultonBairner2007" class="citation journal cs1">Fulton, Gareth; Bairner, Alan (2007). <li id="cite_note-72"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-72">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFMike_Jones2012" class="citation news cs1">Mike Jones (3 November 2012). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/football-insider/wp/2012/11/03/will-redskins-rule-again-determine-outcome-of-presidential-election/">"Will Redskins Rule again determine outcome of presidential election?"</a>. <i>The Washington Post</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20141107110626/http://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/football-insider/wp/2012/11/03/will-redskins-rule-again-determine-outcome-of-presidential-election/">Archived</a> from the original on 7 November 2014<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-73"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-73">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.espnfrontrow.com/2012/10/redskins-rule-mnfs-hirdt-on-intersection-of-football-politics/">"<span class="cs1-kern-left"></span>'Redskins Rule': MNF's Hirdt on intersection of football &amp; politics"</a>. <i>ESPN Front Row</i>. 30 October 2012. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20151117032035/http://www.espnfrontrow.com/2012/10/redskins-rule-mnfs-hirdt-on-intersection-of-football-politics/">Archived</a> from the original on 17 November 2015<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">12 June</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=ESPN+Front+Row&amp;rft.atitle=%27Redskins+Rule%27%3A+MNF%27s+Hirdt+on+intersection+of+football+%26+politics&amp;rft.date=2012-10-30&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.espnfrontrow.com%2F2012%2F10%2Fredskins-rule-mnfs-hirdt-on-intersection-of-football-politics%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASport" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-74"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-74">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/%C3%89tienne_de_La_Bo%C3%A9tie" title="tienne de La Botie">tienne de La Botie</a>, <i><a href="/wiki/Discourse_on_Voluntary_Servitude" title="Discourse on Voluntary Servitude">Discourse on Voluntary Servitude</a></i> (1549), Part 2</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-75"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-75">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://dergipark.org.tr/tr/download/article-file/904168">Disappearance of Traditional games by the imitation of Colonial Culture through the Historical parameters of Cultural Colonialism</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20221126161837/https://dergipark.org.tr/tr/download/article-file/904168">Archived</a> 26 November 2022 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-76"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-76">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://dergipark.org.tr/">Md Abu Nasim</a><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190801043229/https://dergipark.org.tr/">Archived</a> 1 August 2019 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-77"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-77">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Gardinier, Norman E., 'The Olympic Festival' in <i>Greek Athletic Sports and Festivals</i>, London: MacMillan, 1910, p.195</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Watson1-78"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Watson1_78-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Watson1_78-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><i>Sports and Christianity: Historical and Contemporary Perspectives</i>, Nick J. Watson, ed. (Routledge: 2013), p. 178.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-79"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-79">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/Tertullian" title="Tertullian">Tertullian</a>, <i><a href="/wiki/De_spectaculis" title="De spectaculis">De spectaculis</a></i>, Chapter 4.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-80"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-80">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><i><a href="/wiki/De_spectaculis" title="De spectaculis">De spectaculis</a></i> Chapter 15.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Handel2020-81"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Handel2020_81-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Handel2020_81-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFHandel2020" class="citation book cs1">Handel, Paul S. (2020). <i>Reasons Why Organized Sports Are Not Pleasing to God</i>. Immanuel Missionary Church. p.&#160;4.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Reasons+Why+Organized+Sports+Are+Not+Pleasing+to+God&amp;rft.pages=4&amp;rft.pub=Immanuel+Missionary+Church&amp;rft.date=2020&amp;rft.aulast=Handel&amp;rft.aufirst=Paul+S.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASport" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Organizations</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

with NKC identifiers</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Articles_with_NARA_identifiers" title="Category:Articles with NARA identifiers">Articles with NARA identifiers</a></li></ul></div></div>
</div>
</main>
</div>
